channel.title: Xen + Quake = Scorn
channel.description:
[youtube.com/watch?v=gug_0mNhg4k](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gug_0mNhg4k)
That opening shot reminded me so much of Xen's environment. Then it got a bit darker in a monochromatic, Quake sort of way. In all honestly, I'm in love. (With the art direction/design, not necessarily the gameplay.)
